name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Taip to write confidently on web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly use Chrome Build-in  Gemini AI to rephrase, translate, reply, summarize, etc. Customize prompts for tailored responses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your writing instantly with TAIP, the Gemini nano AI-powered Chrome extension designed for seamless text transformation. Simply select and copy any text on the web, press Command/Ctrl + Shift + U, and choose from a range of options like "Rewrite Text," "Correct English," "Translate to English," and more. For unique needs, use the "Custom" option to add personalized instructions â€“ like inserting emojis or summarizing text.

Perfect for anyone who wants clear, polished, and engaging text across emails, social media, and more. Try TAIP and make every word count!

Note
This extension relies on experimental features of Chrome as of November 2024, It may not work in the future due to changes in Chrome's functionality.


Prerequisites
1. Gemini Nano APIs supported chrome or Chrome Canary
2. Following flags enabled in 
Open chrome://flags, set the following two flags and restart Chrome.
- Enable "Prompt API for Gemini Nano" Flags
- Enable "Summarization API for Gemini Nano" Flags
- Enable "Enables optimization guide on device" Flags
